trans-unit.resname: Ribat Tours is a travel and tourism agency, created in March 1983 and approved by the Ministry of Tourism in Morocco. Ribat Tours specializes in cultural and sporting trips, trekking of all kinds, stays, à la carte trips and also your own proposal.
trans-unit.source: Ribat Tours is a travel and tourism agency, created in March 1983 and approved by the Ministry of Tourism in Morocco. Ribat Tours specializes in cultural and sporting trips, trekking of all kinds, stays, à la carte trips and also your own proposal.
trans-unit.target: Ribat Tours est une agence de voyages et de tourisme, créée en mars 1983 et agréée par le ministère du Tourisme du Maroc. Ribat Tours est spécialisé dans les voyages culturels et sportifs, les randonnées en tous genres, les séjours, les voyages à la carte et aussi votre propre proposition.

trans-unit.resname: Luxury bivouacs in the middle of the desert
trans-unit.source: Luxury bivouacs in the middle of the desert
trans-unit.target: Des bivouacs de luxe en plein désert

trans-unit.resname: We want with an open heart and full of joy, to bring you closer to a culture of an isolated population and to share with them their pleasure of life and to let you taste the charm of the silence of nature, which they live in. keeping a traditional life and wanting to live far from any civilization by sticking to the traditions of the country.
trans-unit.source: We want with an open heart and full of joy, to bring you closer to a culture of an isolated population and to share with them their pleasure of life and to let you taste the charm of the silence of nature, which they live in. keeping a traditional life and wanting to live far from any civilization by sticking to the traditions of the country.
trans-unit.target: Nous voulons avec un cœur ouvert et plein de joie, vous faire rapprocher d´une culture d´une population isolée et de partager avec eux leur plaisir de vie et de vous laisser goûter le charme du silence de la nature, qu´ils vivent en gardant une vie traditionnelle et voulant vivre loin de toute civilisation en s´attachant aux traditions du pays.

trans-unit.resname: We want with an open heart and full of joy, to bring you closer to a culture of an isolated population and to share with them their pleasure of life and to let you taste the charm of the silence of nature, that they live by keeping a traditional life and wanting to live far from any civilization by sticking to the traditions of the country.
trans-unit.source: We want with an open heart and full of joy, to bring you closer to a culture of an isolated population and to share with them their pleasure of life and to let you taste the charm of the silence of nature, that they live by keeping a traditional life and wanting to live far from any civilization by sticking to the traditions of the country.
trans-unit.target: Votre voyage avec nous, participera dans le développement de la vie sociale et économique de cette population oublié. Nous utilisons leur maison simple pour y passer une ou plusieurs nuits chez eux. Ils nous préparent nos repas, leurs mules portent nos bagages. Nous sommes bien accueillis. C´est la culture Berbère. Nos prix sont raisonnables afin de garantir à notre agence une clientèle gentille et propre.
